price: 你将来会看见，每一民族都是屈膝的，每一民族都要被召去看自己的功过簿。今日，你们将受自己行为的报酬。”
arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٖ جَاثِيَةٗۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٖ تُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَٰبِهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyatan kullu ummatin tud'ʿā ilā kitābihā al-yawma tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
